alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 9:39PM AKST until November 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Visibility one half mile or less at times in blowing snow. North winds gusting to 30 mph. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
